title: Most negative columnists
author: VD
content_html:
From Lying in Ponds:


1 Robert Scheer

2 Molly Ivins

3 Paul Krugman

4 Maureen Dowd

5 Ann Coulter

6 Thomas Sowell

7 Joe Conason

8 NYT Lead Editorial

9 Richard Cohen

10 Michael Kinsley



















I count two conservatives and eight liberals there. Clearly, it’s those conservatives who are the mean, nasty ones….
